name: Ethiopian Calendar
body:
### Welcome to Ethiopian Calendar Pages.
The Ethiopian Calendar is based on the ancient Coptic calendar and still in use today in Ethiopia. It has twelve 30-day months and a 13th month of five days (six days in leap years). Download the tool at [Nuget](https://nuget.org/packages/EthiopianCalendar/)
### EthiopianDate
```C#
EthiopianDate ethiopianDate = new EthiopianDate(2005,08,8); //year,month,day
EthiopianDate ConvertedethiopianDate = new EthiopianDate(new DateTime(2015,5,6));
```
### Authors and Contributors
Baakal Tesfaye @baakal
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
